definitions.title: coll.
definitions.body: gift(s);—abs. ´[[מ]] Ge 34:12 + 2 t.; cstr. id. Pr 18:16 (v. Baer:ad loc. Ges:§ 92 g Kö:ii 1, 98); sf. [[מַתָּנׇם]] Nu 18:11; —marriage-gifts Ge 34:12 (J; + [[מׂהַר]]); offerings Nu 18:11 (P; ´[[תְּרוּמַת מ]]); elsewh. gen., gifts, presents, Pr 18:16, Pr 21:14 (‖[[שׁׂחַד]]); [[אִישׁ מַתָּן]] Pr 19:6 = a giver of gifts.
